componentDescription: Allows users to manage a group of toggle buttons.

shape.description: Defines the shape of the toggle buttons.

items.description: An array of toggle items to display and manage.

variant.description: The visual style variant of the toggle group.

colorScheme.description: The color scheme of the toggle component.

onToggleChange.description: Callback function that is called when the active state of any toggle changes.

activeToggles.description: Array of ids of currently active toggles.

setActiveToggles.description: Function to update the array of active toggle ids.
